title: Introduction to Dollar-Cost Averaging Strategies
description: Most of you have probably heard the saying that somebody "averaged" into or out of his investment position. But what does it exactly mean, and what different dollar-cost averaging strategies exist? We plan to unveil our new “Dollar-Cost Averaging” report for Quantpedia Pro clients next week, and this article serves as a short introduction to this term.
